price: ¿Acaso esperan que la Hora [del Juicio] les llegue por sorpresa, sin que se den cuenta?
arabic: هَلۡ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا ٱلسَّاعَةَ أَن تَأۡتِيَهُم بَغۡتَةٗ وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: hal yanẓurūna illā al-sāʿata an tatiyahum baghtatan wahum lā yashʿurūna
